attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Chancellor of the Exchequer, Gordon Brown has done immeasurable
damage to the country.  The old have been robbed of their pensions, the young 
have been robbed of the chance of ever owning their own homes (with uncontrolled
house price inflation), while the last budget proved his disdain for those on low
incomes.  It is time for him to go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
